alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Nacogdoches; Panola; Rusk; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 9:30PM CDT until April 12 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON...PANOLA...SOUTHEASTERN RUSK...NORTHERN NACOGDOCHES AND NORTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 930 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Elysian Fields to 7 miles southwest of Nacogdoches, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Nacogdoches, Carthage, Timpson, Garrison, Beckville, Deberry, Elysian Fields, Pinehill, Trawick, Appleby, Mount Enterprise, Gary City, Stockman, Lawsonville, Fairplay and Dotson. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for eastern and northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
